product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes: Yellowstone National Park
long_description: . Author: Bill Schneider. Softcover; 101 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Morris Book Publishing, LLC; copyright 2011. Hikes vary from half-hour strolls to full-day trips and are ranked from easiest to most difficult, making it simple to choose a perfect hike. Includes GPS coordinates, mile-by-mile directions and clear trail maps. Hikes are scattered throughout the entire park, leading you to uncongested trails and some of the park's best-kept secrets. .
short_description: Best Easy Day Hikes: Yellowstone National Park offers descriptions and detailed maps for 30 easy-to-follow trails that lead to some of the most scenic places in the park.
